title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers via proxy.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, and tool callers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI); supports RAG, multi-user, and plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, embed, and manage models in Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI client for Ollama with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support for x86_64 and ARM64.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with streaming chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop GUI for Ollama with markdown and code highlighting.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama with optional CUDA and ROCm acceleration.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with serde types and tokio streaming.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template that connects to Ollama via the JS SDK and supports plugins.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that brings Ollama models into Discord threads with slash commands.
